variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a missense mutation, changing the amino acid Leucine to Tryptophan at position 22 of the protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was increased by 200% for the variant NM_014783.5:c.66T>A compared to the wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression less than or equal to 120% compared to the wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression greater than 140% compared to the wild-type.
